title: Cumberland Island National Seashore: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs       FOR GENERAL PARK INFORMATION Contact the Main Information Number at 912-882-4336. To make ferry reservations, please contact the ferry reservation line at 877-860-6787 Inquiries from media representatives should contact the park's Public Information Officer Cumberland Island National Seashore 101 Wheeler Street St Marys, GA 31558 Phone: 912-882-4336 x 257 Fax: 912-882-6284 E-mail the Public Information Officer For special or commercial use permit information, including filming permits, contact the park's Special Park Use Coordinator Cumberland Island National Seashore 101 Wheeler Street St Marys, GA 31558 Phone: 912-882-4336 x 253 Fax: 912-882-6284 E-mail the Special Park Use Coordinator FOR GENERAL PARK INFORMATION Contact the Main Information Number at 912-882-4336
